title: Sight (2012)
overview: A short futuristic film featuring Augmented reality and Gamification by Eran May-raz and Daniel Lazo. This is our graduation project from Bezaleal academy of arts.
storyline: A short futuristic film featuring Augmented reality and Gamification. by Eran May-raz and Daniel Lazo. This is our graduation project from Bezaleal academy of arts.
